data.eml:eml: The genus Alterosa Blahnik, 2005 (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae, Philopotaminae) in northeastern Brazil, including the description of three new species and an identification key for the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dumas, Leandro Lourenco, Calor, Adolfo Ricardo, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz (2013): The genus Alterosa Blahnik, 2005 (Trichoptera, Philopotamidae, Philopotaminae) in northeastern Brazil, including the description of three new species and an identification key for the genus. ZooKeys 317: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.317.5437, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.317.5437
